name: Emergency Room: Real Life Rescues
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

From the developers of the best-selling Emergency Room series comes a thrilling new medical simulation designed especially for the Nintendo DS. Ever wonder what it's like to be a real paramedic? Serious traumas such as drowning, broken bones, and deadly gunshot wounds can happen in a heartbeat. Show off your medical skills as you revive, treat, and keep your patients alive. Their lives depend on your quick actions.
  • Emergency Room: Real Life Rescues puts the scalpel in your hand!
  • Heart-pounding excitement in 30 unique emergency cases
  • Using the stylus and touch screen, control 20+ realistic medical tools
  • Fellow paramedics provide guidance every step of the way
